content: संत्यज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To abandon; जायामदोषामुत संत्यजामि <ls>R. 14. 34.</ls> {@--2@} To avoid, shun; <ls>Bh. 1. 81.</ls> {@--3@} To give up, renounce; <ls>Ms. 4. 181.</ls> {@--4@} To except, exclude; संत्यज्य विक्रमादित्यं धैर्यमन्यत्र दुर्लभं <ls>Rāj. T. 3. 343.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To deprive (one) of, rob.
